fields.title: Conditions
fields.description: Parameters to control where and when the feature will be placed.

fields.title: Minecraft Biome Filter
fields.description: List of filter tests to determine which biomes this rule will attach to.

fields.title: Domain
fields.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

fields.title: Operator
fields.description: The comparison to apply with 'value'.

fields.title: Subject
fields.description: The subject of this filter test.

fields.title: Test
fields.description: The name of the test to apply.

fields.title: Value
fields.description: The value being compared with the test.

fields.title: AND
fields.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

fields.title: NOT
fields.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

fields.title: OR
fields.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

fields.title: All
fields.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

fields.title: All Of
fields.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

fields.title: Any
fields.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

fields.title: Any Of
fields.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

fields.title: None Of
fields.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

fields.title: Placement Pass
fields.description: When the feature should be placed relative to others. Earlier passes in the list are guaranteed to occur before later passes. Order is not guaranteed within each pass.

fields.title: Description
fields.description: Identifier for the Feature Rule and Feture to place.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature rule in the format 'namespace_name:rule_name'. 'rule_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Places Feature
fields.description: Named reference to the feature controlled by this rule.

fields.title: Distribution
fields.description: Parameters controlling the initial scatter of the feature.

subForm.title: Scatter Params
subForm.description: Controls the scatter distribution of a particular object.

fields.title: Coordinate Evaluation Order
fields.description: The order in which coordinates will be evaluated. Should be used when a coordinate depends on another. If omitted, defaults to "xzy". Supported orders are defined by "Coordinate Evaluation Order".

fields.title: Iterations
fields.description: Number of scattered positions to generate.

fields.title: Scatter Chance
fields.description: Probability that this scatter will occur. Not evaluated each iteration; either no iterations will run, or all will.

fields.title: Denominator
fields.description: Denominator for scatter probability.

fields.title: Numerator
fields.description: Numerator for scatter probability.

fields.title: X
fields.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

fields.title: Random Distribution Type
fields.description: Type of distribution. Supported distributions are defined by "Random Distribution Type".

fields.title: Extent
fields.description: Lower and upper bound (inclusive) of the scatter range, as an offset from the input point to scatter around.

fields.title: Grid Offset
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the offset along this axis.

fields.title: Step Size
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the distance between steps along this axis.

fields.title: Y
fields.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

fields.title: Random Distribution Type
fields.description: Type of distribution. Supported distributions are defined by "Random Distribution Type".

fields.title: Extent
fields.description: Lower and upper bound (inclusive) of the scatter range, as an offset from the input point to scatter around.

fields.title: Grid Offset
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the offset along this axis.

fields.title: Step Size
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the distance between steps along this axis.

fields.title: Z
fields.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

fields.title: Random Distribution Type
fields.description: Type of distribution. Supported distributions are defined by "Random Distribution Type".

fields.title: Extent
fields.description: Lower and upper bound (inclusive) of the scatter range, as an offset from the input point to scatter around.

fields.title: Grid Offset
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the offset along this axis.

fields.title: Step Size
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the distance between steps along this axis.
